data.message: I am looking (without success) for assistance with my Facebook page. No matter what site I visit or what a "like" I get a "content exception" interruption. this is extremely annoying. I am a Grandmother and I only "like" photos of family, pets and so on. I even got this Content exception interruption when visiting your page! How can I fix this, or will you please do it?  I can't post photos either, some Content exception pops up. Please HELP!

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Lauren. Please report what you're experiencing to us here: http://bit.ly/2vLDuTR. -Stephanie
